title: Spiking Neural Network Decision Feedback Equalization for IM/DD Systems. (arXiv:2304.14152v1 [cs.NE])
abstract: A spiking neural network (SNN) equalizer with a decision feedback structure is applied to an IM/DD link with various parameters. The SNN outperforms linear and artificial neural network (ANN) based equalizers.
context:
Title: Spiking Neural Network Decision Feedback Equalization for IM/DD Systems. (arXiv:2304.14152v1 [cs.NE])
Abstract: A spiking neural network (SNN) equalizer with a decision feedback structure is applied to an IM/DD link with various parameters. The SNN outperforms linear and artificial neural network (ANN) based equalizers.
translated_title: 基于脉冲神经网络的决策反馈均衡器用于IM/DD系统
translated_abstract: 本文研究了一种基于脉冲神经网络的决策反馈均衡器，并将其应用于IM/DD链路的各种参数。结果表明，与线性和人工神经网络（ANN）均衡器相比，脉冲神经网络均衡器具有更好的性能。
tldr: 本论文介绍了一种基于脉冲神经网络的决策反馈均衡器，用于IM/DD系统。实验表明，该均衡器的性能优于传统的线性均衡器和人工神经网络均衡器。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a spiking neural network equalizer with a decision feedback structure for IM/DD systems, which outperforms linear and artificial neural network based equalizers.
